full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO DKAR NAG GNYIS KYI GSER SKYEMS DANG MYUR MDZAD MA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES MGON PO DKAR NAG GI GSER SKYEMS SOGS DON TSAN 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GANGS CAN MGON PO RGYAL DBANG @005A *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I SKU'I GAM DU BCAR ZHING, DAD 'DUN DGE LA BRTZON DER RANG LA YANG MI PHYED PA'I DAD STOBS CAN GSOL DPON RJE DRUNG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN NAS BSKUL NGOR, ^GONG MA CHEN PO'I LUNG GIS ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS BZHI SDE DGA' LDAN BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,) SNYING RJE RANG GZUGS MA H'A KA LA YI, ,THUGS DAM BSKONGS PHYIR GTOR 'BUL GSER SKYEMS 'DI, ,DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG KHUR BLANG NAS, , @005B SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS,, ,,MANGGA LAm, DGE'O,, BKRA SHIS,, ,,
